input: Books are a window to the world. Imagination is limitless. Dreams fuel ambition.
validityText:
The input is a paragraph of text as required by the specification. It is composed of three separate sentences: "Books are a window to the world.", "Imagination is limitless.", and "Dreams fuel ambition.". This clearly meets the input specification that the text must contain at least three separate sentences. The input includes a combination of letters and punctuation, complying with the rule that it can include any combination of letters, numbers, symbols, and punctuation. Finally, the input text does not consist solely of whitespace characters.

No violation.

OK

Imagination is limitless, allowing us to explore endless possibilities.

Dreams fuel ambition and inspire us to achieve great things.
